function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Suspension of international travel","Impact":"Decreased international passenger traffic","Mitigation":"Implementing virtual means of communication for property viewings","Technologies":"Virtual tour technologies, Skype, FaceTime","People":"Real estate industry, home buyers and sellers","Owner":"Real estate brokers, real estate companies"},{"Description":"Redundancy and unpaid leave for workers","Impact":"Inability to pay rent, mortgages, and household expenditures","Mitigation":"Offering mortgage holidays and financial support","Technologies":"Financial support programs, mortgage holiday policies","People":"Workers, homeowners, renters","Owner":"Government, mortgage lenders, employers"}]}
